text: Neil Smallwood (born 3 December 1966) is an English former professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper in the Football League for York City and Darlington, and in non-League football for Goole Town, Nestlé Rowntree, Pickering Town and York Railway Institute. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from York Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:York City F.C. players Category:Darlington F.C. players Category:Goole Town F.C. players Category:Nestlé Rowntree F.C. players Category:Pickering Town F.C. players Category:York Railway Institute A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Neil Smallwood
